content.en_us: Can combine two fluids and one item into a single fluid. The recipe is defined by setting the output fluid with a fluid identifier. If an output has multiple possible recipes, the recipe can be changed using the [C] button.
content.zh_cn:
可将两种流体和一种物品混合为一种新流体，可通过用流体识别码设定输出的 流体来决定该机器执行的配方。若
某种流体有多种可能的配方，则可通过“C”按钮 切换使用的配方。
